dcterms:description: A large dataset containing 2923 realizations of permeability K fields corresponding to two facies (sand and mud), used for the prediction of pressure and saturation fields.
dcterms:title: Large dataset containing 2923 realizations of permeability K fields
mls:task: Prediction of pressure and saturation fields

dcterms:description: 3D simulated data of two-phase flow in a porous media, publicly available for research purposes.
dcterms:title: 3D simulated data of two-phase flow in a porous media
